org.kepler

Class Kepler

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.kepler.Kepler

  • public class Kepler
extends java.lang.Object
    A class to initialize the build system, then start the Kepler GUI or execute workflows from the command line. In the latter case, command line arguments specify different run time configurations.
    Author:
    Chad Berkely, Daniel Crawl, David Welker

      • parseArgs

        public static boolean parseArgs(java.lang.String[] args)
        Parse the command line arguments and run the appropriate application.
        Returns:
        If true, no error occurred parsing the arguments.

      • runApplication

        public static int runApplication()
        Run the appropriate application based on command line arguments.
        Returns:
        Returns 0 if success, 1 if there was an error.

      • load

        public static void load(java.lang.String className,
                        java.lang.String methodName,
                        java.lang.String[] args)
                 throws IllegalActionException
        This method provides a generic loader. It first updates the classpath with all the jars in $KEPLER/lib/jar, and then uses reflection to invoke the method. NOTE: the method must be static.
        Throws:
        IllegalActionException
